mapper.select: select tp.id, tp.position_name, tp.position_due_date, tc.company_name from tbl_position tp join tbl_company tc on tp.company_id = tc.id where tp.id in ( select position_id from tbl_apply ta where member_id=#{id} )
select count(tp.id) from tbl_position tp where tp.id in ( select position_id from tbl_apply ta where member_id=#{id} )
